CustomField.description: US-0011525 - Expose Campaign detail on Customer account US-0011887
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Related_Task__c ) ) , HYPERLINK("/" & Related_Task__c, "Related Task", "_blank") , IF( NOT( ISBLANK( IER_ID__c ) ) , HYPERLINK("/" & IER_ID__c , "Individual Email Results", "_blank") , "" ) )
CustomField.label: Show Details
